import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import { SlideToggle } from 'react-slide-toggle'; import Breadcrumb from '../../../common/breadcrumb'; import QtyVertical from '../common/qty-vertical'; import { removeFromCart, clearCart, moveFromCartToWishlist } from '../../../../action'; function ShoppingCart( props ) { const { cartItmes, removeFromCart } = props; const clearCart = ( e ) => { e.preventDefault(); if ( props.cartItmes.length > 0 ) props.clearCart(); } const moveToWishlist = ( e, item ) => { e.preventDefault(); props.moveFromCartToWishlist( item ); } return ( <> Porto React Ecommerce - Cart Page

) } const getCartTotal = items => { let total = 0; if ( items ) { for ( let i = 0; i < items.length; i++ ) { total += parseInt( items[ i ].sum, 10 ); } } return total; } const mapStateToProps = ( state ) => { return { cartItmes: state.cartList.cart ? state.cartList.cart : [] } } export default connect( mapStateToProps, { removeFromCart, clearCart, moveFromCartToWishlist } )( ShoppingCart );
